system.description:
When sung, this spell-song dispels all spells and magical effects within its area of effect. However, unlike the Dispel Magic spell, there is always a chance that a spell or effect will resist being dispelled.

Effects:

  • Dispels all spells and magical effects within a 20' x 20' x 20' cube.
  • Each affected spell or effect has a base 20% resistance if its level is equal to or lower than the bard's level.
  • For every level higher than the bard's, the resistance increases by +5%.

Resistance Calculation:

  • Example: A 7th-level bard attempts to dispel a Cloudkill spell cast by a 12th-level magic-user.
  • The resistance chance is 20% + (5% x 5) = 45%.
  • Roll [[/r 1d100 #Dispel Resistance]]; if the result is lower than or equal to the resistance chance, the spell resists being dispelled.

Additional Notes:

  • Applies to spell-like effects from magic items, with the DM estimating the original caster's level.
  • Permanent magical effects are subject to DM discretion for dispelling.
system.effect: Attempts to dispel all magical effects in the area
